#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int ans,t,i,l;
	string a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
		l=a.length();
		ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='A'||a[i]=='D'||a[i]=='O'||a[i]=='P'||a[i]=='R')
			ans++;
			else
			if(a[i]=='B')
			ans+=2;
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}
